overview: When the local adult book store stocks Beamonstar sexual enhancement pills, the customers who buy them aren't sure if they will work, so they're completely unprepared for the fuck-fest onslaught that ensues! Some of the pills boost libido while some unleash bigger loads, and each guy finds a lucky girl who reaps the benefits of their 'Monstar-Powered' cock! find your own inner monster watching this tribute to sexual supplements that really 'up' your game!
title: Be A Monstar
